title: Truth Social Traffic Has Surged Since Trump’s Indictment
description: The former president has used Truth Social to respond to news about the indictment.

title: TikTok Is Fined $15.9 Million Over Misusing Kids’ Data in Britain
description: The video-sharing app inappropriately allowed more than one million underage children in the United Kingdom to access the platform in 2020, regulators said.

title: China Strikes Back at Micron Technology Even as It Signals Openness
description: Beijing’s security review of Micron Technology, which has deep roots in China, could have wide-ranging ramifications for other foreign businesses.

title: Instant Videos Could Represent the Next Leap in A.I. Technology
description: A start-up in New York is among a group of companies working on systems that can produce short videos based on a few words typed into a computer.

title: Going Viral on TikTok Can Get Students an A in These College Classes
description: A marketing professor gave his students a challenge: If they made a video that got a million views, the final exam would be canceled.
